methods.javadoc: Returns the default file used for logging messages.
methods.name: getApplicationLogFile
methods.comment: Returns the default file used for logging messages.

methods.name: setApplicationLogFile
methods.comment:
Use this to override the default application log file, before you
 initialize the logging system.

params.name: file
params.comment: The file to use as the application log file

methods.name: setScriptLogFile
methods.comment:
Use this to override the default application log file, before you
 initialize the logging system.

params.name: file
params.comment: The file to use as the application log file
